June 5, 1906 D Bowness Contest
Bowness Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
bowness-contest
None
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Bowness-on-Windermere, Cumbria, England, UK Prizes - 1st £16, 2nd £9, 3rd £4, 4th £2. March contest 1st Crosfield's, 2nd Earby, 3rd Dalton Town. 5 bands competed.
March 4, 2012, 5:30 p.m. Sept. 13, 2018, 12:37 p.m.
1 Perfection Soap Works G. Bedforth Dinorah
2 Earby Band William Heap Cluster of Classics
3 Dalton Town Band John Carter Cluster of Classics
4 Barrow Steelworks Band A. McAlister Cluster of Classics
5 Barrow Wesleyan Francis Traversi Satanella [unknown arranger]
